source.sqlReaderQuery:
DELETE FROM Stg.Avms_CandidateDetails

SELECT ShortCode
  FROM Stg.CandidateConfig
WHERE SourceDb='RAAv1'
    AND Category='Ethnicity'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @CAID BIGINT

EXECUTE @CAID= [dbo].[GenerateCopyActivityId] @{pipeline().parameters.RunId}, 'RAAv1','Eth'

SELECT @CAID as CAID

INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{pipeline().parameters.RunId}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportAVMSCandidateEthToDM'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportAVMSCandidateEthToDM'
     AND RunId=@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}

SELECT 1
SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='AVMSPlus' and IsEnabled=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)

SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)


Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='AvmsPlus'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}'
	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
					  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;
/* Apply Transformations */
SET @collist= 
REPLACE(
REPLACE(
REPLACE(
@COLLIST
,'[DATEOFBIRTH]',
'(DATEDIFF(YEAR,[DateOfBirth],GETDATE())-(CASE WHEN DATEADD(YY,DATEDIFF(YEAR,[DateOfBirth],GETDATE()),[DateOfBirth]) > GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) as [Age]'
)
,'[EthnicOrigin]'
,'(@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}+EthnicOrigin) as EID'
)
,'[CandidateEthnicOriginId]'
,'(@{pipeline().parameters.RunId}+CandidateEthnicOriginId) as EID'
)

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery
@{activity('GetImportSelectQuery').output.firstRow.SourceQuery}

preCopyScript.value: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'avms_@{item().TABLE_NAME}' AND TABLE_SCHEMA=N'Stg') DROP TABLE [Stg].[avms_@{item().TABLE_NAME}]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-at-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-at-dfac-kv.vault.azure.net'
                      WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-test-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-test-dfac-kv.vault.azure.net'
                      WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-pp-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-pp-dfac-kv.vault.azure.net'
                     WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-prd-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-prd-dfac-kv.vault.azure.net'
                      ELSE 'Unknown'
           END VaultUrl

SELECT CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-at-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-at-databucket'
                      WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-test-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-at-databucket'
                      WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-pp-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-at-databucket'
                     WHEN '@{pipeline().DataFactory}'='das-prd-dfac-df'
                      THEN 'das-prd-databucket'
                      ELSE 'Unknown'

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DELETE FROM Stg.RAA_VacancyReviews Where ManualQaFieldChangeRequested='false'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportRAAVacancyReviewsToDM'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

INSERT INTO Mgmt.SourceFileList
(FileName)
select '@{item().name}'

/* Get Source File ID */

Declare @SourceFileId int

SELECT @SourceFileID=Max(SourceFileId) From Mgmt.SourceFileList WHERE FileName='@{item().name}' 



/* Update SourceFileList with the  RunId that's processing the File */
 UPDATE SFL
    SET SFL.RunId=@{variables('RunId')}
   FROM Mgmt.SourceFileList SFL
  WHERE SFL.SourceFileID=@SourceFileId

SELECT @SourceFileId as SourceFileId

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT CAST(MAX(Run_Id) AS VARCHAR(256)) as RunId FROM Mgmt.Log_RunId

sqlReaderQuery.value:
INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{variables('RunId')}
	   ,'Step-2'
	   ,'ADF-ImportDataFromFile'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @RunId int
DECLARE @RetentionDate datetime

SET @RunId = @{variables('RunId')}

SELECT @RetentionDate=DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()) 

/* Run Validation Checks if Import File is Successful */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='ADF-ImportDataFromFile' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId)
BEGIN 
EXEC dbo.RunValidationChecks @{variables('RunId')}
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Import Data From File Failed in ADF -Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)



/* Import Valid Records to Target Clone Tables */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='RunValidationChecks' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId) 
BEGIN
EXEC dbo.LoadTargetCloneTables @{variables('RunId')}
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Validation Checks Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)


/* Swap Clone Tables With Live */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='LoadTargetCloneTables' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId) 
BEGIN
EXEC dbo.LoadTargetTables @{variables('RunId')}
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Loading Clone Tables Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)



--/* Update History Table with Processed File */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='LoadTargetTables' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@RunId)
BEGIN
EXEC dbo.UpdateHistoryTable @{variables('RunId')},@RetentionDate
END
ELSE RAISERROR( 'Loading Target Tables Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)




--/* Raise Error if Updating History Table Failed */

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='UpdateHistoryTable' and Execution_Status<>1 and RunId=@{variables('RunId')})
BEGIN
RAISERROR( 'Updating History Table Failed-Check Log Table For Errors',1,1)
END


IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results where StoredProcedureName='UpdateHistoryTable' and Execution_Status=1 and RunId=@{variables('RunId')})
BEGIN
UPDATE Mgmt.Log_RunId SET EndDateTime=getdate() Where Run_Id=@{variables('RunId')}
END

SELECT '1'

DECLARE @LogID int
 DECLARE @ErrorMessage varchar(max)
 DECLARE @RunId Bigint
 DECLARE @ErrorId int



 SET @Runid=@{variables('RunId')}


 SELECT @LogID = MAX(LogID)
   FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
  WHERE StoredProcedureName='ADF-ImportDataFromFile'

  INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Error_Details
	  (
	   ErrorProcedure
	  ,ErrorMessage
	  ,ErrorDateTime
	  ,Run_Id
	  )
  SELECT 
        
	    'ADF-ImportDataFromFile',
            @{concat('''',replace(activity('CopyFileToDb').Error.message,'''',''''''),'''')},
	    GETDATE(),
		@RunId as RunId; 

  SELECT @ErrorId=MAX(ErrorId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Error_Details

/* Update Log Execution Results as Fail if there is an Error*/

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=0
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,ErrorId=@ErrorId
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@RunId

SELECT 'NA'

IF EXISTS (SELECT FileName FROM Mgmt.SourceFileList where FileName='@{item().name}' and datediff(MINUTE,fileuploadeddatetime,getdate()) <=15)
begin
SELECT 'Already In Process' as FileStatus
end
ELSE 
BEGIN
SELECT 'Start Process' as FileStatus
END

}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($SourceQuery),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name,PLTableName as PLTableName FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='Accounts' and IsEnabled=1 and FullCopyToPL=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)


SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'


SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)

Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Accounts'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('AK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('AK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2)+SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,2) as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='Accounts'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     	      where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))

	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

 

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{variables('RunId')}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportAccountsToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportAccountsToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @SQLCode Nvarchar(255)
declare @K1 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @k1=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K1 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K1=@K1 OUTPUT

SELECT @K1 as K1

DECLARE @SQLCode Nvarchar(255)
declare @K2 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @K2=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K2 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K2=@K2 OUTPUT

SELECT @K2 as K2

        @{variables('RunId')}

SELECT  SourceTableName as Table_Name, SourceSchemaName as Schema_Name,PLTableName as PLTableName FROM [Mtd].[SourceConfigForImport] Where SourceDatabaseName='AppRedundancy' and IsEnabled=1

declare @cols varchar(max)

SELECT  @cols = STUFF
    (
        ( 
            SELECT DISTINCT '], [' + column_name
            FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
            where table_name='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
                 and table_schema='@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}'
            FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 2, ''
    ) + ']';

SELECT @cols Columns

Declare @cols varchar(max)
DECLARE @SQLCode nvarchar(max)


SELECT @SQLCode=SQLCode from stg.SQLCode WHERE TYPE='EBPP'


SET @Cols= '@{variables('SourceColumnList')}'

Declare @SourceQuery Varchar(max)

Declare @collist VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @collist=
 STUFF
    (
        ( 
SELECT ','+LTRIM(RTRIM(ConfigList))
FROM
(SELECT SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList
   FROM (SELECT VALUE as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToInclude,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='AppRedundancy'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                      from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
				     where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))
  UNION
SELECT replace(replace(replace(@SQLCode,'T1','CONVERT(NVARCHAR(512),'+ConfigList+')'),'K1','0x'+'@{variables('AK1')}'),'K2','0x'+'@{variables('AK2')}') + ' as ' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(ConfigList,'[',''),1,2)+SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REPLACE(ConfigList,']','')),1,2)+SUBSTRING(ConfigList,len(ConfigList)/2,2) as ConfigList
   from (SELECT value as ConfigList
   FROM Mtd.SourceConfigForImport SCFI
  CROSS APPLY string_split(ColumnNamesToMask,',')
  WHERE SourceDatabaseName='AppRedundancy'
    AND SourceTableName='@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
    AND SourceSchemaName='@{item().Schema_NAME}') SourceConfigInDM
  WHERE  exists (select LTRIM(RTRIM(value)) as ExistingList
                   from STRING_SPLIT(@cols, ',') Cols 
	     	      where LTRIM(RTRIM(SourceConfigInDM.ConfigList))=LTRIM(RTRIM(Cols.value)))

	) AS SourceConfigInDM
  FOR XML PATH('')
        ), 1, 1, ''
    ) ;

 

SET @SourceQuery='select ' + @collist + ' from [@{item().SCHEMA_NAME}].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]'; 

SELECT @SourceQuery SourceQuery, @ColList as ColumnList

INSERT INTO Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
	  (
	    RunId
	   ,StepNo
	   ,StoredProcedureName
	   ,ADFTaskType
	   ,StartDateTime
	   ,Execution_Status
	  )
  SELECT 
        @{variables('RunId')}
	   ,'Step-5'
	   ,'NA'
	   ,'ImportAppRedundancyToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
	   ,getdate()
	   ,0

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportAppRedundancyToDMStaging-'+'@{item().TABLE_NAME}'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1

declare @K1 nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLCode='SELECT @k1=convert(nvarchar(max),'+SQLCode+',2)' From Stg.SQLCode Where [Type]='CRG'

EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @SQLCode, N'@K1 nvarchar(max) OUTPUT',@K1=@K1 OUTPUT

SELECT 'N/A'

DECLARE @LogID int

   SELECT @LogID=MAX(LogId) FROM Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   WHERE ADFTaskType='ImportAppRedundancyToDM'
     AND RunId=@{variables('RunId')}

UPDATE Mgmt.Log_Execution_Results
   SET Execution_Status=1
      ,EndDateTime=getdate()
	  ,FullJobStatus='Pending'
 WHERE LogId=@LogID
   AND RunID=@{variables('RunId')}

SELECT 1
